Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom.
In order to continue with your Design Patent order, you will need to provide sketches, photographs, CAD files, and/or any other images that will help us to get a better idea of how you want your invention to look. Please also include a narrative of the key design elements. You can send these materials electronically to patents@quickpatents.com.
If you want to mail in physical materials, send them to:
QuickPatents - Attn: Jeanette Johnson 32861 Calle Perfecto, Suite A San Juan Capistrano, CA 92675
Please also include your order number for reference.
Feel free to contact QuickPatents if you need further assistance. Simply email patents@quickpatents.com or call toll free at 800-505-5610.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
The LegalZoom Team
